price: Wala msiwe kama wale wanao sema: Tumesikia, na kumbe hawasikii.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
footnotes: Wala msiwe kama wanaafiki wanao sema: Tumeisikia Haki na tumefahamu. Lakini hawaifuati wala hawaiamini. Basi wamekuwa kama wasio sikia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
